Headline: #12 Roosevelt Temporary Reroute at Roosevelt/Cicero
ShortDescription: 12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Roosevelt, Kostner, 16th, Cicero and Roosevelt, due to police activity near Roosevelt/Cicero

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Roosevelt, Kostner, 16th, Cicero and Roosevelt then resume their normal route on Roosevelt, due to police activity near Roosevelt/Cicero .

Allow extra travel time.
